author: Michael Person
comment: Awesome watch face but it has no customization options. It'd be a 5 star rating if it did. And what is "environment mode?

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content: Tanks a lot for your review, we will work in customization options its a great idea. About envioroment mode sorry it was a mistake, is ambient mode that is when the watch enter standby mode (dimmed light).

author: Christopher Solis
comment: doesnt work on my lemfo les 1, lost 2dollars fast.

reply.author: Reality Labs
reply.content:
Christopher we're sorry for the inconvenience, our apps are only compatible in devices with Android Wear operating system.

If you want the return of the money of your purchase please send us to therealitylabs@gmail.com the ID of the purchase (which starts with GPA ...), also the date and time of the purchase to make the return of your money.
